statements.name: PROC SOAP
statements.description: Invokes a web service through Java Native Interface (JNI).

arguments.name: IN=
arguments.description: Specifies the fileref that is used to input XML data that contains a PROC SOAP request.

arguments.name: ENVFILE=
arguments.description: specifies the location of the SAS environments file.

arguments.name: ENVIRONMENT
arguments.description: specifies that you use the environment that is defined in the SAS environments file.

arguments.name: MUSTUNDERSTAND=
arguments.description: specifies the setting for the mustUnderstand attribute.

arguments.name: OUT=
arguments.description: specifies a fileref for response output.

arguments.name: PROXYDOMAIN=
arguments.description: specifies an HTTP proxy server domain.

arguments.name: PROXYHOST=
arguments.description: specifies an HTTP proxy server host name.

arguments.name: PROXYPASSWORD=
arguments.description: specifies an HTTP proxy server password.

arguments.name: PROXYPORT=
arguments.description: specifies an HTTP proxy server port.

arguments.name: PROXYUSERNAME=
arguments.description: specifies an HTTP proxy server user name.

arguments.name: SRSURL=
arguments.description: specifies the URL of the System Registry Service.

arguments.name: ENVELOPE
arguments.description: specifies that a SOAP envelope is to be included in the response.
